4300900.name: Prison of Lies Demo
4300900.description:
Four prisoners on death row are cleared of all charges. But the prison has a quota to meet. The four are put in a room and asked to decide among themselves over the course of an hour... who will be the one to die?

Prison of Lies is a psychological linear visual novel about lies, trust, and empathy. There are four chapters, each of which get progressively shorter.

While playing the game, you uncover more about each prisoner.

The demo contains the first chapter of the game.

Features

  • Original soundtrack

  • Non-linear storytelling

categories.description: 无需应对快速反应事件
